snippet.title: Succubus x Saint - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Liruna, a former saint candidate, has found herself caught up in a ritual to resurrect an evil god. As a result, poor Liruna falls prey to a terrible curse. Due to the ritual, various monsters emerged into her world, wreaking havoc in their wake. It is up to Liruna to end this ritual and save herself...and her world. 

Succubus x Saint on Kagura Games Store: https://www.kaguragames.com/product/succubus-x-saint/

Succubus x Saint on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1078370/Succubus_x_Saint/
